name: No Flash Photography
description:
Each photo holds a memory, waiting to be awakened. Make every photo count!

This game is PC VR only.  Developed using the Oculus Quest 2.

If anyone is interested, here are almost all the videos I have watched while making this game. I see game jams as a great way to learn and build experience, so I hope these videos can help you out if you see a mechanic that you want to implement! I am a solo developer and this is my first ever game jam and VR game that I have developed and released. I hope everything runs smoothly and that everyone enjoys it!
